sourceDesc.p: TEI-page files converted by Python to TEI-entry file

div.p: ROGA in antiquity, a preſent which the emperors made to the ſenators, magiſtrates, and even to the people ; and the popes and patriarchs to their clergy. Theſe rogæ were diſtributed by the emperors on the firſt day of the year, on their birth-day, or on the na-talis dies of the cities ; and by the popes and patriarchs in paſſion-week. Roga is alſo uſed for the common pay of the ſoldiers.
